x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
WellLink empowers students and young professionals to discover educational programs, mentorship opportunities, and skill-building resources—all through a centralized ServiceNow portal. It will:

  • Connect youth with verified mentors, workshops, and learning events.
  • Enable educators and organizations to manage referrals and track outcomes.
  • Provide sponsors and stakeholders with transparent dashboards on reach and impact.
  • Foster inclusive growth by making support accessible, visible, and actionable.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Young people often struggle to find mentorship, learning resources, and support programs. Meanwhile, educators and community organizations lack a unified platform to share opportunities, manage referrals, and track engagement. This disconnect limits youth potential and leaves valuable resources underused. A centralized solution is needed to bridge these gaps and connect support with those who need it most.
